Skill¶

class Skill¶

Represents a skill or ability.

A skill has a name, MP cost, power (damage or heal amount), and a type.

Public Functions

Skill(std::string name, int mpCost, int power, SkillType type)¶

Constructor for Skill.

パラメータ:

  • name -- The name of the skill.

  • mpCost -- The MP cost to use the skill.

  • power -- The power of the skill (damage or healing amount).

  • type -- The type of the skill (ATTACK or HEAL).

std::string getName() const¶

Gets the name of the skill.

戻り値:

The skill name.

int getMpCost() const¶

Gets the MP cost of the skill.

戻り値:

The MP cost.

int getPower() const¶

Gets the power of the skill.

戻り値:

The power value.

SkillType getType() const¶

Gets the type of the skill.

戻り値:

The skill type.

Private Members

std::string name¶

The name of the skill.

int mpCost¶

The MP cost required to use the skill.

int power¶

The power of the skill.

SkillType type¶

The type of the skill.

Source Code

Header (include/models/Skill.h):

 1#ifndef SKILL_H
 2#define SKILL_H
 3
 4#include <string>
 5
 6/**
 7 * @brief Enumeration of skill types.
 8 */
 9enum class SkillType {
10    ATTACK, ///< Offensive skill that deals damage.
11    HEAL    ///< Support skill that restores HP.
12};
13
14/**
15 * @brief Represents a skill or ability.
16 *
17 * A skill has a name, MP cost, power (damage or heal amount), and a type.
18 */
19class Skill {
20public:
21    /**
22     * @brief Constructor for Skill.
23     *
24     * @param name The name of the skill.
25     * @param mpCost The MP cost to use the skill.
26     * @param power The power of the skill (damage or healing amount).
27     * @param type The type of the skill (ATTACK or HEAL).
28     */
29    Skill(std::string name, int mpCost, int power, SkillType type);
30
31    /**
32     * @brief Gets the name of the skill.
33     * @return The skill name.
34     */
35    std::string getName() const;
36
37    /**
38     * @brief Gets the MP cost of the skill.
39     * @return The MP cost.
40     */
41    int getMpCost() const;
42
43    /**
44     * @brief Gets the power of the skill.
45     * @return The power value.
46     */
47    int getPower() const;
48
49    /**
50     * @brief Gets the type of the skill.
51     * @return The skill type.
52     */
53    SkillType getType() const;
54
55private:
56    std::string name; ///< The name of the skill.
57    int mpCost;       ///< The MP cost required to use the skill.
58    int power;        ///< The power of the skill.
59    SkillType type;   ///< The type of the skill.
60};
61
62#endif // SKILL_H

Implementation (src/models/Skill.cpp):

 1#include "models/Skill.h"
 2
 3Skill::Skill(std::string name, int mpCost, int power, SkillType type)
 4    : name(name), mpCost(mpCost), power(power), type(type) {}
 5
 6std::string Skill::getName() const {
 7    return name;
 8}
 9
10int Skill::getMpCost() const {
11    return mpCost;
12}
13
14int Skill::getPower() const {
15    return power;
16}
17
18SkillType Skill::getType() const {
19    return type;
20}
